summary: IN NOVEMBER, I HAD FILED LEMON LAW ON MY 2000 DODGE CARAVAN DUE TO THE NUMEROUS FAILED ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR LEAKY FUEL INJECTORS.   I LOST THE ARBITRATION BECAUSE IT WAS DETERMINED TO BE NOT SAFETY RELATED.  BUT ACCORDING TO NHSTA CAMPAIGN # 00V268000,  THE PROBELM WAS SAFETY REALATED.  SO DODGE AND THE STATE OF HAWAII (WHERE I LIVED WHEN LEMON LAW WAS FILED) HAVE LIED AND I HAVE BEEN DRIVING A FIRE BOMB WAITING TO HAPPEN.
